item.title: Texas Frightmare Weekend
item.description:
This year I attended Texas Frightmare Weekend for the first time. By now it seems like forever ago. But lucky you â€” I saved all the pictures! So here they are without much verbal adornment, or it'd probably take me another month and a half to get this up.
I suggest you take your time with this post. It's a big one. Really savor the photographs. Left-click to enlarge them.
